title: Adapt project of android studio to multiple screens
body:
The problem is the following I am trying to do a project but I want to adjust it so that it looks good in several screen sizes, when I create the xml file with the size indp defined, in prewiew it looks good but When I run the emulator does not look good.

What other method is there?

The problem is that I create the different folders with the different resolutions in dp but when I run the emulator always comes out in layout for 4 inches.And I'm adapting it for multiple screens.
